title: Healing Bloom - Flutter App
description: Healing Bloom is a Flutter-based mobile application that helps users identify skin diseases using advanced image recognition powered by Inspection Rusnet V2. It also offers personalized skincare and cosmetic product recommendations through face scanning and features an integrated shopping platform for medicines and beauty products.

title: EduCloudX â€“ AI Learning Platform
description: EduCloudX is an AI-powered social learning platform built with Django, designed to connect students and educators through personalized, collaborative, and interactive learning. It features course management, AI-driven PDF summarization, content generation using Hugging Face APIs, and secure authentication via Google OAuth2.
